title: Still Pond for Google TV free
creator: Moodscapes

extendedInfo.description: Enjoy this relaxing ambient HD video of a reflective pond in the woods.  Looks great on your phone, tablet, or Google TV.  Use the HD video alarm clock feature to wake up to soothing waves and sound.  Turn this on as a background in your office, while entertaining, preparing a meal, reading, or even trying to fall asleep. This HD video will make you feel as if you were there....Features -  Video alarm clock and timer feature to wake up, or fall asleep, to the soothing video and sound of Hawaiian waves.  -  Timer to turn video off after certain time period-  Text that can be customized or branded for your office or home in place of Moodscapes text.  Moodscapes logo can be removed as well.-  No Ads-  HD quality video for your phone, tablet or Google TV-  HD quality sound - with both natural and multiple soundtracks to choose from.  White noise from clip is very soothing and relaxing and can be used to fall asleep-  HD video acts as a great back drop, similar to a live wallpaper or screen saver when the app is running-  Go beyond your typical aquarium, fish tank or fireplace wallpaper or screen saver with Moodscapes-  No streaming or lagging once app is installed-  HD Video may not be compatible with older phones Please check out our other nature Moodscapes and enjoy!

reviews.title: loose the logos
reviews.comment: Almost got it right but blew it by placing logos on the HD quality scene.
reviews.author: Jeff Rosen

reviews.title: Simply the Best
reviews.comment: Well done! The only developer that provides relaxing HQ-video apps I desperately searched for my android-stick LCD-TV. Nice sound and background music! Each app has separate icon.  Anticipating other HQ video: aquarium, fireplace etc...
reviews.author: Igor G

reviews.title: Almost...
reviews.comment: This has the most seamless audio of the applications. My only quibble is the Moodscape logo in the bottom left of the screen, which should disappear after a time and, say, come back with movement of the mouse or finger, depending on device...
reviews.author: Jabba Catski

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Calm and relaxing. Reminds me of the area where I grew up.
reviews.author: A Google User
